title: Growing FIRECRACKER CHILI PEPPER Time Lapse #shorts

tasks.task: Planting and caring for firecracker chili peppers
subtasks: Ensuring adequate sunlight (6-8 hours per day)
Timing seed starting (6-8 weeks before last frost)
Alternately, direct sowing after frost danger passes
Ensuring seedlings have 2 sets of true leaves
Regular watering to keep soil moist but not warm
